# ImageCel.Pixels property

Gets an Array of Color elements that represents the raw pixel data for this [`ImageCel`](../ImageCel.md).

```csharp
public Color[] Pixels { get; }
```

## Remarks

Order of pixels is row by row, from top to bottom, for each scanline read pixels from left to right.
